title: [Self-directed] Workshop to Improve Workplace Learning Environments Using a Knowledge Management System

context.prior_knowledge: Core mathematical concepts and workplace knowledge-sharing experience
context.additional_context: VR simulation-based training for professionals to systematically convert and share tacit knowledge in mathematics through practical exercises

learning_goals: Learners can design processes to convert tacit knowledge into explicit knowledge forms using knowledge management systems
Learners can develop and execute team-based knowledge-sharing scenarios in VR-based simulation environments
Learners can propose organizational-level knowledge management improvement plans through project-based assessments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
